name: Land of Tales
description:
Kya started walking to school one morning and she was thinking of her big brother Raymond and the tales he used to read to her when, all of a sudden, a big orange portal opened up in front of her and swooped her in. A few moment later the portal opens up and Kya is gently pushed on snowy ground. In this snowy new land she realizes she must collect tales that are scattered all over. Happy trails Kya!

Press Esc to see the controls. 

Press Q to see the list of books that you have to collect.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game project created for the Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #5.

Gamejam theme: Fairy Tales

December 17th - 19th 2022

Thank you for playing and rate this small game if you like it. 

Suggestions for further development are welcomed. 

All the best, 

Haifisch
